doc.title: About creating the version information dialog
doc.para:
About the version information dialog This window is often referred to as "Help-About" of the software. In the case of KAG, this can be written in the KAG scenario file. To use it, both helpMenu.visible and helpAboutMenuItem.visible in Config.tjs must be set to true. Also, the size of the version information dialog is the size specified by aboutWidth and aboutHeight. The KAG scenario file displayed in the version information dialog is named about.ks.
Normally, it is enough to display the image with the version information on the background, but depending on how you make it, you can make something elaborate.

about.ks limits about.ks has some limitations not found in the normal KAG scenario. There are other restrictions other than those listed below (eg, most of the settings in Config.tjs are not followed).
BGM, sound effects, video, etc.
Basically usable, but the number of sound effect buffers is fixed at one. Movies (AVI, SWF, etc.) cannot be used.
Message layer
The number of message layers is fixed at one. Message history cannot be displayed. Message layer 0 is displayed in the initial state, but the size is undefined, so use it after hiding or specifying the position and size with the position tag.
